The America’s Cup Comes to Bermuda In 2017

Bermuda: May 25 – June 28, 2017

For the first time in history, beautiful Bermuda will play host to the America’s Cup. It’s a perfect match: one of the most prestigious events in sailing and a luxurious island paradise. The sailing conditions should be perfect in June and the stunning backdrop of Bermuda is the icing on the cake.

Roadtrips is proud to offer official spectator packages to the 2017 America’s Cup. With access to the best hotel rooms in Bermuda from the Official Bed Bank, viewing on official spectator boats, and access to official hospitality, we’ve got you covered. Plus, our guests have access to a team of top travel hosts onsite that understand travel the way they want it. At Roadtrips, our goal is to provide our guests with the absolute best America’s Cup experience possible.

Exclusive America’s Cup Packages for the Privileged Few

Our fully customizable packages include your choice of accommodations at some of the premier hotels on the island including the Rosewood Tucker’s Point, the Fairmont Southampton and the Elbow Beach Resort. With Bermuda’s modest hotel inventory of just over 2000 hotel rooms, accommodations are at a premium for this highly anticipated event and we’re proud to offer some of the finest available. Whatever package you choose, you can rest assured that it will include the high-touch service Roadtrips is known for.

A Perfect Setting

Even without an event as exciting as the America’s Cup, Bermuda is a spectacular travel destination in its own right. With sparkling turquoise waters fringed by luscious pink sand beaches, nearly perfect weather, great golf, and a vibe that’s unique to the country, it’s easy to see why savvy travelers continue to flock to this extraordinary island nation year after year.
